heading: HB00683
0: AN ACT AMENDING REPUBLIC ACT NUMBERED FOUR HUNDRED NINETY THREE (RA 493) TO INCLUDE IN THE COVERAGE OF PROHIBITION THE USE, WEARING MANUFACTURE AND SALE OF UNIFORMS AND TEXTILE OF UNIFORMS OF THE MEMBERS OF THE ARMED FORCES OF THE PHILIPPINES AND THE PHILIPPINE NATIONAL POLICE, PRESCRIBING HEAVIER PENALTY FOR VIOLATION THEREOF, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
